Event: To begin with, a 20-year-old young man started\na clothing company called Company X in 2009
Then, Company X expanded its market quickly in 2010
Then, Company X got a 40 million investment
Then, Company X owned 2000 stores in 50 cities
Then, Company X  owned 6000 stores across the country\neven in small counties
Then, Company X owned about 9000 stores\nand had an income over 10 billion
Then, Company X ranked as the\nbiggest company in the clothing market
Then, the clothing market began to shrink\ndue to the rise of E-commerce
Then, the sales of Company X decreased nearly 1/4
Then, Company X was stuck in great debt\ndue to its overstocked commodities
Then, Company X shut down 2400 stores
At last, Company X declared bankruptcy\n under the strike of coronavirus
